job.title: Junior Software Engineer

environment for full creative expression of oneselfno restrictions no stigma You should be unapologetically YOU while making friends and keeping up with trends ppbrppWe have raised capital from Biz Intl Growth at Facebook exHead of ProductGrowth at Pinterest exCMO at ViacomCBS and moreppnbspppstrongAbout YoustrongppYou need to eat breathe and sleep software development seriously you must be fanatical about itppThis role is fulltime will report directly to the CTO and will work closely with the product manager and designersppWe have high standards of quality so this job will be fastpaced and collaborative withppan emphasis on getting things done right and not just getting them doneppnbspppstrongWhat youll dostrongpulliJoin our team working on our flagship socialbranding platformliliCollaborate with other members of our SWE team to craft and implement the product backlog and learn new technologies while working on scaling our platformliliCollaborate with the members of other Tagg teams across the board to shape our product and influence the direction in which Tagg takes its main platformliliBecome part of a close committed and lively team that assumes ownership of its work takes pride in it and is fully invested in the success of the productliulpnbspppstrongWhat were working withstrongpulliMobile application development with React NativeliliAPI design and
